definitions.definition: A circular frame on which cadgers carry hawks for sale.

definitions.example: "Are ye gannin te cadge a lift of yoer fatha?"

definitions.definition: To obtain something by wit or guile; to convince people to do something they might not normally do.
To carry hawks and other birds of prey.
To hawk or peddle, as fish, poultry, etc.
To intrude or live on another meanly; to beg.
